trans-unit.source: Provides the functionality to restore the migration, or flow, of the execution context between threads.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller funktioner för att återställa migrering eller flödet av körningskontexten mellan trådar.

trans-unit.source: An execution context contains all execution-related information for a logical thread.
trans-unit.target: En körningskontexten innehåller all information som rör körning för en logisk tråd.

trans-unit.source: The flow of the execution context to other threads can be prevented by using the <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, which returns an AsyncFlowControl structure.
trans-unit.target: Flödet av körningskontexten till andra trådar kan förhindras genom att använda den <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metod som returnerar en AsyncFlowControl-struktur.</xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo%2A> method of the returned AsyncFlowControl structure can be used to undo the flow suppression.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo%2A>metoden returnerade AsyncFlowControl-struktur som kan användas för att återställa flödet Undertryckning.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo%2A>

trans-unit.source: The AsyncFlowControl structure must be used on the same thread on which it was created.
trans-unit.target: AsyncFlowControl-strukturen måste användas på samma tråd som den skapades.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Frigör alla resurser som används av den aktuella instansen av den <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>.
trans-unit.target: Anropa `Dispose` när du är klar med hjälp av <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Den `Dispose` metoden lämnar kvar det <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>oanvändbar.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Efter att `Dispose`, måste du släppa alla referenser till den <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>så skräpinsamlingen kan frigöra minne som den <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>var upptar.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> </xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [Rensa ohanterade resurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) och [implementera en metod för ta bort](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid anropet `Dispose` innan du släpper senaste referens till <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: De resurser som den använder frigörs annars inte förrän skräpinsamlingen anrop av <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>objektets `Finalize` metod.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure is not used on the thread where it was created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> strukturen används inte i tråden där den skapades.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure has already been used to call Dispose or <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo*>.
trans-unit.target: - eller - <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> struktur har redan använts för att anropa Dispose eller <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo*>.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Undo*>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Anger om det angivna objektet är lika med aktuellt <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: An object to compare with the current structure.
trans-unit.target: Ett objekt som ska jämföras med den aktuella strukturen.

trans-unit.source: if obj is an structure and is equal to the current structure; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Om obj är en struktur och är lika med aktuellt struktur; annars .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure is equal to the current <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Anger om den angivna <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> strukturen är lika med aktuellt <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure to compare with the current structure.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> struktur ska jämföras med den aktuella strukturen.

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal to the current structure; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Om obj är lika med aktuellt struktur; annars .

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for the current <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en Hashkod för aktuellt <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: En hash-koden för aktuellt <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structures to determine whether they are equal.
trans-unit.target: Jämför två <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> strukturer för att avgöra om de är lika.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two structures are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om två strukturerna är lika; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structures to determine whether they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Jämför två <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> strukturer för att avgöra om de inte är lika.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the structures are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om strukturerna inte är lika; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Restores the flow of the execution context between threads.
trans-unit.target: Återställer flödet av körningskontexten mellan trådar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method returns an <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> structure that is used to restore the flow.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden returnerar en <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>struktur som används för att återställa flödet.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> </xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Undo method must be called only on the <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl> structure returned by its associated <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ångra-metoden måste anropas endast på den <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>struktur som returneras av dess associerade <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A>metod.</xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.SuppressFlow%2A> </xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure is not used on the thread where it was created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> strukturen används inte i tråden där den skapades.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"></xref> structure has already been used to call <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Dispose*> or Undo.
trans-unit.target: - eller - <xref href="System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl"> </xref> struktur har redan använts för att anropa <xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Dispose*>eller ångra.</xref:System.Threading.AsyncFlowControl.Dispose*>
